name: Keep the Wheel spinning
description:
Game presentation

Keep the Wheel spinning is a clicker, but unlike other clickers, here you can loose. The objective is to Keep the Wheel Spinning, to do this you can spin it manually or recruit runners.

Context

This game has been #MadeWithBolt in 4 days for the BoltJam #9, the theme was : Keep it Goin'.

How To Play

You must not let the wheel stop. Click on the button on the wheel to spin it.

 Once the wheel has been spun once, the game start. Each second you earn 5 credits, allowing you to recruit Runners or increase your spinning force.

Each time you spin the wheel, it will spin for a number second equal to your spinning force, 5 seconds by default. Once you have enought money you can increase it.

You can also recruit Runners to stop the timer of the wheel. To do so, click on the "+" button on the bottom left screen corner.
